attributes.action: Petition to remove Amy Lamé as Night Czar Role to be re-evaluated.
attributes.additional_details: Amy’s response to Covid-19 has been extremely disappointing, and has not inspired any confidence in why she receives a salary of £83,169.  I have only seen Amy mention one venue gaining financial support; the Royal Vauxhall Tavern.
attributes.background: This petition is for the role to be abolished, or for Amy to be replaced with someone that will take a far more active role as a defender and supporter for nightlife as well as London’s music festivals and wider music scene, as a crucial and vibrant part of London’s arts and culture landscape.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for anyone to lose their job.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
